mapper.select: select id, waybill_plan_id,split_goods_id, waybill_code, waybill_status,waybill_source, group_id, group_name, driver_id, driver_name, driver_phone, vechicle_id, vechicle_num, customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone, sales_order, cust_contact_man, send_man, send_phone, send_province, send_city, send_county, send_address, receive_man, receive_phone, receive_province, receive_city, receive_county, receive_address, transport_way, goods_type, start_date, arrive_date, is_receipt, is_urgent, pickup_way, distribution_way, attachment1, attachment1_name, attachment2, attachment2_name, attachment3, attachment3_name, attachment4, attachment4_name, attachment5, attachment5_name, waybill_remark, carrier_company_id,carrier_company_name, company_id, pub_date, finish_date, cancel_date, cancel_man, cancel_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted from t_waybill where(company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and (waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) and is_deleted = 0 order by id desc

select distinct waybill_plan_id from t_waybill where (company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and (waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) and is_deleted = 0
